info.title: Chat APIs
info.description: Manage messages, users, groups for a particular app using our Chat API.

post.description: Creates a new API key

name.description: Friendly name for the API key.

scope.description: Scope for the API key. Possible values: fullAccess, authOnly.

get.description: Lists API keys

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: Scope of the apikey. Available values: fullAccess, authOnly

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Searches for specified keyword in name

get.description: Retrieves API key

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: An apikey to retrieve.

put.description: Updates an API key

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: An apikey to update.

name.description: Friendly name for the API key.

scope.description: Scope for the API key. Possible values: fullAccess, authOnly.

delete.description: Deletes an API key

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: An apikey to delete.

data.message: The Api Key fcf32d085482db7ef10e971967d70a91cdb6677a has been deleted successfully.

post.description: Creates a new user

uid.description: Unique identifier of the user. Please refer to https://prodocs.cometchat.com/docs/concepts#uid

avatar.description: URL to profile picture of the user.

role.description: User role of the user for role based access control.

statusMessage.description: A message providing context related to the user's current status or mood.

metadata.description: Additional information about the user as JSON. If you plan to use [Email Notification](doc:android-extensions-email-notification#section-configure-your-backend-to-store-emails) or [SMS Notification](doc:android-extensions-sms-notification#section-configure-your-backend-to-store-phone-number) extensions, Please add the private metadata here.

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific users.

withAuthToken.description: Includes authToken of created user in response.

get.description: Lists all the users of an app

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description:
The searchKey query parameter work for both name and uid:
It performs a LIKE% query, searching for uid/name values starting with the specified characters.

parameters.name: searchIn
parameters.description: Searches for specified keyword in name,UID or both.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: User list can be fetched depending on the user status. (available,offline).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Fetches users count.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of users to be fetched in a request. The default value is 100 and the maximum value is 1000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page Number.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Retrieves user list based on role.

parameters.name: withTags
parameters.description: Includes tags in the response.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Fetches only those users that have these tags.

parameters.name: roles
parameters.description: Fetches users based on multiple roles.

parameters.name: onlyDeactivated
parameters.description: Fetches all the deactivated users of an app.

parameters.name: withDeactivated
parameters.description: Fetches all the users including deactivated users.

put.description: Reactivates users for the specified UIDs

delete.description: Deactivates users for the specified UIDs

get.description: Retrieves user details for a specified UID.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: UID of the user on whose behalf the action is performed.

put.description: Updates a user with the provided UID

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: An UID of a user.

avatar.description: URL to profile picture of the user.

role.description: User role of the user for role based access control.

statusMessage.description: A message providing context related to the user's current status or mood.

metadata.description: Additional information about the user as JSON. If you plan to use [Email Notification](doc:android-extensions-email-notification#section-configure-your-backend-to-store-emails) or [SMS Notification](doc:android-extensions-sms-notification#section-configure-your-backend-to-store-phone-number) extensions, Please add the private metadata here.

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific users.

unset.description: The unsettable user attributes are avatar, link and metadata.

delete.description: Deletes a user for the specified UID

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: An UID of a user.

permanent.description: Permanently deletes the user along with all the messages, conversations, etc.

data.message: User with superhero6 has been deleted successfully.

post.description: Creates a group.

guid.description: A unique identifier for a group.

type.description: Type of the group. Can be public, password or private.

password.description: A password required to join the the group with type password

icon.description: An URL for a group icon.

owner.description: The UID that you wish to make owner of the group

tags.description: List of tags to identify specific groups.

members.description: Add members to a group with scope admins,moderators and participants.

admins.description: UIDs of users to be made admins.

moderators.description: UIDs of users to be made moderators.

participants.description: UIDs of users to be made participants.

usersToBan.description: UIDs of the users to be banned from the group.

data.name: Project Group
data.description: project related discussions between members

get.description: Lists the groups.

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Searches for given keyword in group's list (either GUID, name or email).

parameters.name: searchIn
parameters.description: Searches for specified keyword in name,GUID or both.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sorts the group list by either Name,Guid or Created at . Available values: name, guid, createdAt

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Sorts the group list in ascending or descending order. Available values: asc, desc

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of groups to be fetched in a request. The default value is 100 and the maximum value is 1000.

parameters.name: affix
parameters.description: Determines whether to fetch the groups either before or after createdAt/updatedAt timestamp. Possible values are append(after) and prepend(before).

parameters.name: updatedAt
parameters.description: Fetches the groups list after a particular updatedAt timestamp.

parameters.name: withTags
parameters.description: Includes those groups that have tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Fetches only those groups that have these tags.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Fetches groups based on group type(public, protected, password).

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Fetches groups based on multiple types.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

parameters.name: hasJoined
parameters.description: Fetches all the joined groups of a user. This will work only with onBehalfOf parameter in header. It accepts only true as a value, setting it as false simply removes this filter.

get.description: Retrieves details of a group for a given GUID.

data.name: Project Group
data.description: project related discussions between members

put.description: Updates the group details for a given GUID.

type.description: The type of the group. The available values are: public, password and private.

password.description: A password required to join the the group with type password

icon.description: An URL for a group icon.

owner.description: The UID that you wish to make the owner of the group.This field will be ignored if onBehalfOf parameter in the header is present in the request.

tags.description: Updates tags of a group.

unset.description: The unsettable user attributes are icon, description and metadata.

data.name: Project Group
data.description: project related discussions between members

delete.description: Deletes a group with a given GUID.

data.message: Group with guid project-group has been deleted successfully.

post.description: Sends Message on behalf of a user.

interactiveData.text:
Thanks For filling the Form!.

Want to make your gifts more special? Now its easy with our personalized card messages!

Our new feature lets you add a custom message on a beautifully designed card, making your gift-giving extra personal and memorable.
Whether its for a birthday , anniversary , or just because , our card messages will express your feelings perfectly.

To start creating your own card message:
Choose the gift
Write your heartfelt message
Well print it on a high-quality card and include it with your gift
Add a touch of your own sentiments with our personalized card messages. Make every gift unforgettable. Start creating your card message today!
Visit our website Website Link or download our app App Link.

Express more than just words with our Personalized Card Messages.Because its not just a gift, its your feelings.

get.description: Fetches the messages list.

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include the searchKey.

parameters.name: hideMessagesFromBlockedUsers
parameters.description: Fetches messages sent by users who are blocked by the requesting user.

parameters.name: hasAttachments
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include attachments.

parameters.name: attachmentTypes
parameters.description: Displays messages according to the type of attachment. Supported types include: image, video, audio, and file.

parameters.name: hasMentions
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include mentions.

parameters.name: hasLinks
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include links.

parameters.name: mentionedUids
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include the mentioned comma-separated UIDs.

parameters.name: hasReactions
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include reactions.

parameters.name: receiverType
parameters.description: Displays messages based on receiverType (user/group)

parameters.name: affix
parameters.description: Determines whether to pull the messages either before or after any message id. Possible values are append(after) and prepend(before).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Retrieves all those messages after the passed id.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filters messages by category. Possible values: message, action and custom.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filters messages by type.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: Filters messages with sender. If onBehalfOf header is also set then the messages from their common conversations will be filtered.

parameters.name: mentionsWithBlockedInfo
parameters.description: For the mentioned users, provides blocked information with respect to the UID in onBehalfOf header.

parameters.name: mentionswithTagInfo
parameters.description: Provides user tags for the mentioned users.

parameters.name: hideDeleted
parameters.description: Hides deleted messages from List.

parameters.name: onlyDeleted
parameters.description: Includes only deleted messages in List.

parameters.name: hideReplies
parameters.description: Shows only messages skipping the replies in the message thread.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Includes unread message count in List.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: Retrieves all the unread messages in a conversation. It must be used alongside count query parameter.

parameters.name: sentAt
parameters.description: Fetches the messages list after a particular sentAt timestamp.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to fetch. Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 1000

parameters.name: conversationId
parameters.description: Fetches all the messages belong to a particular conversation.

parameters.name: withTags
parameters.description: This will fetch messages along with the tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: This will fetch only those messages belonging to the mentioned tags.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Fetches messages based on multiple categories.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Fetches messages based on multiple types.

parameters.name: fromTimestamp
parameters.description: Fetches the messages from this timestamp.

parameters.name: toTimestamp
parameters.description: Fetches the messages till this timestamp. It will be ignored if fromTimestamp is missing or empty.

get.description: Fetches the details of a message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be fetched.

put.description: Edits the message on behalf of a user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be fetched.

data.description: The data that needs to be modified.

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific messages.

delete.description: Deletes the message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be deleted.

patch.description: Mark message as Interacted on behalf of a user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be fetched.

interactions.description: A list of element Ids to be marked as interacted!

data.message: The message id 7 has been marked as interacted for the user superhero1.

get.description: Lists all the reactions for a message

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose reactions are to be fetched.

get.summary: List reactions with a specific emoji/unicodes
get.description: List reactions with a specific emoji/unicodes for a message

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose reactions are to be fetched.

parameters.name: reaction
parameters.description: reaction whose details are to be fetched.

post.description: Adds a reaction to a message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message to react.

parameters.name: reaction
parameters.description: reaction to react.

delete.description: Removes a reaction from a message

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose reaction is to be removed.

parameters.name: reaction
parameters.description: reaction to be removed.

get.description: Fetching all the conversations

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description:
UID of the user on whose behalf the action is performed.


If onBehalfOf header is not passed,then list Conversations API will be ordered based on `uid`, `updatedAt` and then `conversationWith`

If onBehalfOf header is passed, then list Conversations API will be ordered based on `updatedAt` and then `conversationWith`.

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: Fetches conversations that include the specified searchKey, allowing you to search for conversations based on the name of a User or Group.

parameters.name: conversationType
parameters.description: Retrieves only the specified conversation type (user and group) while fetching conversations list.

parameters.name: withTags
parameters.description: Includes those groups that have tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Fetches only those groups that have these tags.

parameters.name: withUserAndGroupTags
parameters.description: Retrieves conversations with tags

parameters.name: includeBlockedUsers
parameters.description: Set to true to include conversations with blocked users in the response.

parameters.name: withBlockedInfo
parameters.description: Set to true to include block status details of users in each conversation.

parameters.name: userTags
parameters.description: Filters conversations by tags associated with the user entity in the conversationWith property.

parameters.name: groupTags
parameters.description: Filters conversations by tags associated with the group entity in the conversationWith property.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: Lists only unread conversations by excluding the conversations with conversation.unreadMessageCount=0

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: Number of conversations to be fetched in a request. The default value is 100 and the maximum value is 1000.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number.

get.description: This API is deprecated please use Get User/Group ConversationAPI

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description: UID of the user on whose behalf the action is performed.

delete.description: This API is deprecated please use Reset User/GroupConversation API

parameters.name: onBehalfOf
parameters.description: UID of the user on whose behalf the action is performed.

post.description: Sends Threaded Message on behalf of a user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message for which thread message to be sent

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories are message and custom.

type.description: Type of the message. The available values are text, image, file, audio, video.

data.description: JSON containing message attributes.

multipleReceivers.description: JSON containing array of UIDs and GUID for whom the message must be sent. Format for multiple receivers - {"uids": ["uid1","uid2"], "guids":["guid1"]}

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific messages.

get.description: Fetches the messages list of a thread.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose thread messages are to be fetched.

get.description: Fetches messages between onBehalfOfuid and an uid from path param.

parameters.name: searchKey
parameters.description: searches for occurence of message.

parameters.name: hasAttachments
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include attachments.

parameters.name: attachmentTypes
parameters.description: Displays messages according to the type of attachment. Supported types include: image, video, audio, and file.

parameters.name: hasMentions
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include mentions.

parameters.name: hasLinks
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include links.

parameters.name: mentionedUids
parameters.description: Fetches messages that include the mentioned comma-separated UIDs.

parameters.name: unread
parameters.description: displays all the unread messages of the user.

parameters.name: undelivered
parameters.description: displays all the messages those are undelivered.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: displays the count of messages as per group/user

parameters.name: hideReplies
parameters.description: Shows only messages skipping the replies in the message thread.

parameters.name: affix
parameters.description: Determines whether to pull the messages either before or after any message id. Possible values are append(after) and prepend(before).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Retrieves all those messages after the passed id.

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Fetches messages that belongs to specific category.

parameters.name: categories
parameters.description: Fetches messages that contains multiple categories.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Fetches messages that belongs to a specific type.

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: Fetches messages with multiple types.

parameters.name: myMentionsOnly
parameters.description: Filters messages with mentions for the UID in onBehalfOf header.

parameters.name: hasReactions
parameters.description: Filters messages sent by a the uid given in sender query param and has reactions. If onBehalfOf header is also set then the messages from their common conversations will be filtered.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: Filters messages with sender. If onBehalfOf header is also set then the messages from their common conversations will be filtered.

parameters.name: mentionsWithBlockedInfo
parameters.description: For the mentioned users, provides blocked information with respect to the UID in onBehalfOf header.

parameters.name: mentionswithTagInfo
parameters.description: Provides user tags for the mentioned users.

parameters.name: perPage
parameters.description: The number of records to fetch. Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 1000

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to fetch. Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 1000 (works alongside onBehalfOf header)

parameters.name: fromTimestamp
parameters.description: Fetches the messages from this timestamp.

parameters.name: toTimestamp
parameters.description: Fetches the messages till this timestamp.

parameters.name: withTags
parameters.description: This will fetch messages along with the tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: This will fetch only those messages belonging to the mentioned tags.

parameters.description: Fetches messages with multiple types.

parameters.name: myMentionsOnly
parameters.description: Filters messages with mentions for the UID in onBehalfOf header.

parameters.name: hasReactions
parameters.description: Filters messages sent by a the uid given in sender query param and has reactions. If onBehalfOf header is also set then the messages from their common conversations will be filtered.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: Filters messages with sender. If onBehalfOf header is also set then the messages from their common conversations will be filtered.

parameters.name: mentionsWithBlockedInfo
parameters.description: For the mentioned users, provides blocked information with respect to the UID in onBehalfOf header.

parameters.name: mentionswithTagInfo
parameters.description: Provides user tags for the mentioned users.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to fetch. Minimum value: 1, Maximum value: 1000

parameters.name: fromTimestamp
parameters.description: Fetches the messages from this timestamp.

parameters.name: toTimestamp
parameters.description: Fetches the messages till this timestamp.

parameters.name: withTags
parameters.description: This will fetch messages along with the tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: This will fetch only those messages belonging to the mentioned tags.

post.description: Sends Message from a Bot.

parameters.name: uid
parameters.description: An UID of the Bot.

interactiveData.text:
Thanks For filling the Form!.

Want to make your gifts more special? Now its easy with our personalized card messages!

Our new feature lets you add a custom message on a beautifully designed card, making your gift-giving extra personal and memorable.
Whether its for a birthday , anniversary , or just because , our card messages will express your feelings perfectly.

To start creating your own card message:
Choose the gift
Write your heartfelt message
Well print it on a high-quality card and include it with your gift
Add a touch of your own sentiments with our personalized card messages. Make every gift unforgettable. Start creating your card message today!
Visit our website Website Link or download our app App Link.

Express more than just words with our Personalized Card Messages.Because its not just a gift, its your feelings.

get.description: Paginated API to fetch logs for notifications

parameters.name: messageId
parameters.description: To filter based on the ID of message or reply.

parameters.name: reactionId
parameters.description: To filter based on the ID of the reaction added.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: To get the logs for messages that are sent after the mentioned timestamp in milliseconds.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: To get the logs for messages that are sent after the mentioned timestamp in milliseconds.

parameters.name: messageCategory
parameters.description: To filter logs based on the category of the message or reply. Values can be message, interactive.

parameters.name: messageType
parameters.description: To filter logs based on the type of the message or reply. Values are based on the message category.

parameters.name: trigger
parameters.description:
To filter based on the trigger value of the event that is responsible for triggering the notification.
For a message or a reply, the value of this field is after_message.
For message actions, the values are message_deleted or message_edited or message_reaction_added.
For default calling feature, the values are initiated, rejected, cancelled, unanswered.
For group events, the values are: after_group_joined, after_group_left, after_group_members_added, after_group_members_kicked, after_group_members_banned, after_group_members_unbanned, after_scope_changed.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: To filter based on the sender of the message. This has to be uid.

parameters.name: reactionSender
parameters.description: To filter based on the user who reacted on a message.

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: To filter based on the receiver of a message. This can be uid or guid based on the receiverType.

parameters.name: receiverType
parameters.description: To filter based on the receiver's type. The value of this field can be user or group.

parameters.name: reactionReceiver
parameters.description: To filter based on the user who is notified when a reaction is added.

parameters.name: member
parameters.description: To filter based on the user who is notified in a given group. This is only present when the receiverType is group.

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description: To filter based on whether the user was notified using push, email or sms notification.

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description:
To filter based on the provider.
For channel as push, the value of this field can be fcm, apns, custom.
For channel as email, the value of this field can be sendgrid or custom.
For channel as sms, the value of this field can be twilio or custom.

parameters.name: notificationTriggered
parameters.description: The value is true when the notification provider is triggered. If false, the notification was not triggered due to some preference that is mentioned in the reason field.

parameters.name: reason
parameters.description:
Available only when the value of notificationTriggered is false.
This contains the reason for not triggering the notification provider.

To filter logs using reason, use the following values: MESSAGES_PREFERENCE, REPLIES_PREFERENCE, MESSAGE_ACTIONS_PREFERENCE, REACTIONS_PREFERENCE, GROUP_ACTIONS_PREFERENCE, DND_PREFERENCE, MUTE_PREFERENCE, SCHEDULE_PREFERENCE, CALL_PREFERENCE, QUOTA_PREFERENCE, MISSING_EMAIL, MISSING_PHNO, INVALID_PUSH_PROVIDER_ID, TIMED_OUT, NOT_FOUND, TWILIO_CREATE_ERROR.

parameters.name: success
parameters.description:
Available only when the value of notificationTriggered is true.

To filter based on whether the HTTP request to the provider was successful or not, true indicating that the provider returned success while false indicating that the provider returned an error.

parameters.name: affix
parameters.description: To paginate over logs use the value of affix as prepend or append.

parameters.name: logId
parameters.description: To be used with affix for pagination.

post.description: This endpoint is used to submit a message for moderation before it is delivered to the recipient. The message is scanned against the moderation rules configured for the app.

muid.description: The unique identifier for the message

category.description: Category of the message. The available category is message

type.description:
Defines the type of the message based on the selected category.
When `category` is `message`, the allowed values for `type` are:

`text`  Plain text message

`image`  Image message

`audio`  Audio message

`video`  Video message

`file`  File message

When `category` is `custom`, any custom string can be used as the `type`. This allows developers to define and handle custom message types as needed in their UI implementation.

receiver.description: If the receiverType == user the UID of a user receiving the message. else GUID of the group.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

senderUserDetails.description: This property contains information about the sender user. It is required only if the sender does not already exist in CometChat. If provided, the sender user will be created before the message is processed.

receiverUserDetails.description: This property contains information about the receiver user (in case of one-to-one messages). It is required only if the receiver user does not already exist in CometChat. If provided, the user will be created before the message is sent.

receiverGroupDetails.description:
This property contains information about the group receiving the message.
It is required only if the group does not already exist in CometChat. If provided, the group will be created before the message is sent.

tags.description: String array containing developer defined tags.

sentAt.description: 10 digit unix timestamp at which the message would be sent. If left blank, the current timestamp would be used.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve a list of messages that were submitted for moderation. Each message includes its current moderation status based on the rules configured for the app.

parameters.name: sender
parameters.description: Filters messages by the senders uid.

parameters.name: receiverUID
parameters.description: Filters messages by the receiver's uid.

parameters.name: receiverGUID
parameters.description: Filters messages by the receiver's guid in case of group

parameters.name: category
parameters.description: Filters messages by category. Possible values: message and custom.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filters messages by type.

parameters.name: moderationStatus
parameters.description: Filters messages by moderation status.

get.description: This endpoint is used to retrieve the details of a message that was submitted for moderation. The message is fetched along with its current moderation status based on the app's configured rules.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be fetched.

put.description: This endpoint is responsible for editing the message, The moderation status is recalculated based on the app's configured rules for the edited message.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be fetched.

delete.description: This endpoint deletes a previously submitted message. The message is removed along with its associated moderation data, as per the app's configured rules.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the message whose details are to be fetched.

data.message: Message with id 20011 has been deleted successfully.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: Unix timestamp from which usage has to be fetched.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: Unix timestamp till which usage has to be fetched.

get.description: Gives the number of messages sent and receipts received in an interval of five minutes.

200.description: Gives the number of messages sent and receipts received in an interval of five minutes.

CategoryType.description: Type of entries in the list

entity.description: Entity type in which moderation will be performed.

operand.description: Type of message content to moderate (e.g., text, image, video, custom).

operator.description: Operation to be performed for condition evaluation (e.g., contains, equals).

category.description: Type of entries for evaluation, either 'word' or 'pattern'.

isKeywordReferencePresent.description: Indicates if the value contains a reference to a keyword list.

isMediaPresent.description: Indicates if the incoming message contains media content.

value.description: Actual value for the condition, or reference ID if isKeywordReferencePresent is true, or a formula if isMediaPresent is true.

useStoredEmailID.description: If enabled, the webhook will be triggered for a user only if their email address is stored within CometChat.

webhookURL.description: The webhook URL to be triggered for the respective events.

useBasicAuth.description: To enable basic auth for the URL

useStoredPhNo.description: If enabled, the webhook will be triggered for a user only if their phone number is stored within CometChat.

webhookURL.description: The webhook URL triggered for respective events

muid.description: The muid will be a unique Identifier of the message.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories is interactive.

type.description: Type of the message. The available values are card, form and customInteractive.

data.description: JSON containing message attributes. Please select the appropriate schema based on the type property.

multipleReceivers.description: JSON containing array of UIDs and GUID for whom the message must be sent. Format for multiple receivers - {"uids": ["uid1","uid2"], "guids":["guid1"]}

muid.description: The muid will be a unique Identifier of the message.

receiverType.description: The receiverType of the message. either user or group

category.description: Category of the message. The available categories are message and custom.

type.description: Type of the message. The available values are text, image, file, audio, video.

data.description: JSON containing message attributes.

attachments.description: For the messages with image, video, audio or file type (i.e. category=="message" && type !="text"), the property contains an array of attachment objects.

url.description: Contains the URL of the attachment.

size.description: The size of the attachment(in bytes).

multipleReceivers.description: JSON containing array of UIDs and GUID for whom the message must be sent. Format for multiple receivers - {"uids": ["uid1","uid2"], "guids":["guid1"]}

tags.description: A list of tags to identify specific messages.

moderationMessageData.description: Can contain any additional properties except for the key properties.

text.description:
The meaning of the `data.text` property depends on the values of `category` and `type`:
1. When `category` is `'message'` and `type` is `'text'`, it represents the text content of the message.
2. When `category` is `'message'` and `type` is not `'text'`, it represents the caption associated with the attachment.

customData.description: when category==custom, this property can have any JSON object.

attachments.description: For the messages with image, video, audio or file type (i.e. category=="message" && type !="text"), the property contains an array of attachment objects.

url.description: Contains the URL of the attachment. The developer has to make sure that the URL is accessible while calling the API. The API will be downloading the attachment from its current location and upload it to CometChats attachment storage.

size.description: The size of the attachment(in bytes).

until.description: This is a valid timestamp from the future, E.g: 1710696964705

apiKey.description: API Key with fullAccess scope(i.e. Rest API Key from the Dashboard).
